question: Which of the following is the main aim of UP CM Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (CMAPS)?
option1: Job training with monthly stipend to unemployed youth
option3: Free academic education to school dropout
option4: Providing jobs to unemployed youth under MGNREGS
answer: Job training with monthly stipend to unemployed youth
explanation: The main aim of UP CM Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (CMAPS) is providing of job training with a monthly stipend of Rs. 2500 to unemployed youth.
